tool.help: This is a wrapper for the ENA upload tool in https://github.com/usegalaxy-eu/ena-upload-cli The input metadata can be submitted following the tabular format of the templates in https://github.com/usegalaxy-eu/ena-upload-cli/tree/master/example_tables It is also possible to submit an excel file by following the template in https://github.com/ELIXIR-Belgium/ENA-metadata-templates
